fields.comment: the energy this makes music go towards
fields.name: energy_target

fields.comment: if > 0, fade between 0 and energy_target based on distance to this entity
fields.name: fade_range

fields.comment: if 1, attempts to trigger danger music no matter what energy level is reached
fields.name: trigger_danger_music

fields.comment: if fog of war at position of this entity is greater than 'fog_of_war_threshold', this has  no effect
fields.name: fog_of_war_threshold
